page.title: 02LAND COVER.
page.content: 40%Grazing 17%Winter Barley 15%Winter Wheat 10%Rape 5%Potatoes and Peas 5%Summer Barley 8%Buildings The D block has very pleasant scenery with fields of varied crops and a variety of trees and wild flowers. Cutting a diagonal line through the D block is the Shropshire Union Canal The canal is used in the spring and summer months for holiday cruisers making their way,South to Wolverhampton and North to Chester or Wales.There are many pleasant walks through the woods and along the canal bank. There are two churches in the D block One at Lapley and one in Wheaton Aston. Lapley church is the oldest with parts of the building of twelfth century orig
